image.altText: Fog lifts from a landscape in the Yarra Valley in the morning light

image.altText: A young girl sits in a wheelchair. Her eyes are closed.

image.altText: A Gold Coast Suns AFL player handballs to his left while under defensive pressure from a Fremantle opponent.

image.altText: A woman looking serious in her wheelchair in a suburban backyard.

props.synopsis: Now in her 100th year, Lois Whistler has spent all of her life, except for a short period in the 1930s, in one of Australia's most remote island communities.Â
